Description:
Model
Brand: Corsair
Model: CL-9011112-WW


Details
Types: Fan Speed and RGB Lighting Controller
Colors: Black
Specifications: Input voltage - Fan: 12V
Input voltage - RGB: 5V
Max Current - Fan: 4.5A
Max Current - RGB: 4.5A
Headers:
6x 4-pin PWM fan headers
6x 4-pin CORSAIR RGB headers
1x 3-pin CORSAIR RGB header
2x Thermistor ports
Connection cable:
USB 2.0 with 1x USB 2.0 pass-through (top row; 5-pin)
Package contents:
1 x COMMANDER CORE XT
2 x Thermistor cables
Documentation


Features
Features: Connect. Control. Command: The CORSAIR iCUE COMMANDER CORE XT turns your case into a smart case, using CORSAIR iCUE software to conveniently control up to six case fans and lighting for multiple RGB components.

Precise PWM Fan Speeds: Powers and controls up to six PWM fans, including Zero RPM mode to keep the noise down at low loads.

System-Wide RGB Lighting Customization: Control up to 264 RGB LEDs out of the box - directly connect up to six CORSAIR RGB fans*, as well as an additional lighting channel to control other CORSAIR RGB devices such as Hydro X Series lighting, RGB LED Lighting PRO Expansion Kit light strips, or an RGB Fan LED Hub with up to six additional RGB fans.
*Not compatible with CORSAIR SP RGB Series fans.

Intelligent Fan Detection: The COMMANDER CORE XT automatically detects any combination of up to six individually addressable CORSAIR RGB fans, such as the high-performance ML PRO RGB and the ultra-vibrant QL RGB, making them easier than ever to set up.

Accurate Temperature Monitoring: Two included repositionable temperature sensors allow you to accurately monitor temperatures throughout your system with CORSAIR iCUE software.

USB 2.0 Pass-Through Port: Connect an additional internal USB device, such as a CORSAIR AXi Series PSU or PRO XT cooler.

Automated Control: Set up custom fan curves and lighting profiles to automatically adjust fan speeds and RGB lighting based on system temperatures.

Your Setup at Your Command: Powerful CORSAIR iCUE software offers a single interface to customize RGB lighting, monitor CPU and coolant temperatures, adjust fan speeds, and set up fan curves.

Easy Installation: Embedded magnets and a low-profile design make it simple to install the COMMANDER CORE XT on any flat surface inside your case.
Label: Fan HUB Corsair Comander Core XT
